reviews.review: Игра для альтернативно развитых людей, когда есть желание сакнуть дик, тогда опредленно стоит играть в это дерьмо!
Bad game. Full of hackers even in prime servers.
skins on guns? very cool, good game!
Играю уже сколько времени и не разу не пожалел ты кроме моментов тильта
Хорошгая игра, читаки только на ноу праймах, а так все норм)
好游戏 值得一玩 但是别开挂 D:<
Kanser olmak istiyorsanız rahatlıkla satın alabilirsiniz

It's a good game, you can see how Valve is constantly trying to improve the game. It can be seen that Valve did a good job, there are no bugs in the game and excellent optimization.
There is also a very good anti-cheat system. Which very quickly recognizes all cheaters and bans, so there are no cheaters in the game.
In addition, Valve is very generous and made the game free. A very good solution that has expanded and improved the CS:GO community.
Every time I start a game, I feel a surge of energy because I understand that now I have to play with very friendly, strong and honest players.
I AM VERY HAPPY TO PLAY CS:GO

The community is what makes the game. While the competitive mode is really intense and fun, id strongly recommend going on some populated surf servers and interact with the people. I've never found as interesting people as I have on cs.
This game is like a roulette, fun until it turns russian.
Классная игра но лучше не играть.
Good game. Matchmaking needs a buff tho :D

开局率先白给，激发队友潜力。我能看小电视，大哥不能看的。（汪汪）
有开挂死不承认的，嘴臭的，压力怪。
（不过一些社区服环境还行）
但是有不少大哥会耐心教你战术，投掷物。会在你残局白给安慰鼓励你的。 会有和你一起白给，一起开怀大笑的好基友。
玩CSGO是一种情怀（狗头🐶）
